title: Can I still get seasonal rewards if I were to be banned in the past month
body: Title explains itself I was a toxic and have gotten banned recently for 2wks I vow to never be toxic again however just wanted to ask if these rewards are still achievable if not I understand why thanks for feedback!

replies.body:
Our Ranked Rewards 2016 lists the following situations regarding the 2016 season and eligibility for rewards:
>* Players with bans or chat restrictions active when the season ends are ineligible for this year’s rewards.
* **Players issued a ban of seven days or more in the three months prior to the end of the season (from August 7 on) are ineligible for this year’s rewards.**
* Players banned for boosting during the 2016 season remain ineligible for rewards.
* Players who experienced fraud-related and erroneous bans will still be eligible.

Check out our [official announcement](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/2016-ranked-season-ends-soon) for more information. Let me know if you have any questions.
